definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Honey rock village built three ancestral hall, but preserved only Gui Fu Tang.
sentences.chinese: 蜜巖村原建有三個祠堂，但保存下來的僅有桂馥堂。

sentences.english: The second part is devoted to the origin and development of ancestress temple's names.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分考求女祠堂的名字來源。

sentences.english: The focus of the fifth part is the influence of ancestress temple upon Huizhou women.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分力圖發掘女祠堂在徽州婦女觀念中的意義。

sentences.english: Last officer Yu, then lift a step to ancestral temple namely to hike.
sentences.chinese: 上官鈺頓了頓，即擡步往祠堂那走去。

sentences.english: The old rule barring women and poor people from the banquets in the ancestral temples has also been broken.
sentences.chinese: 女子和窮人不能進祠堂喫酒的老例，也被打破。

sentences.english: It is estimated that there are hundreds of this kind building in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江現存的傳統祠堂戲場建築就數以百計。

sentences.english: After the liberation of all three provincial supply and use.
sentences.chinese: 解放後三家祠堂都爲供銷社使用。

sentences.english: O honk swan take them personally to the ancestral temple reconnaissance.
sentences.chinese: 阿嘎旺親自帶她們去祠堂偵察。

sentences.english: Han Jia, is this the temple you mentioned?
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，這就是你說的那座祠堂吧？

sentences.english: Saman temple:It sacrificed for ancestress of Saman…
sentences.chinese: 薩滿祠堂》供奉侗族的女性祖先薩滿。

sentences.english: People with the same surname or family clan gather at their ancestral temples to worship their ancestors in order of their ages.
sentences.chinese: 同宗同族的人們齊聚在先祖祠堂，按年齡祭拜祖先。

sentences.english: The focus of the fifth part is the influence of ancestress temple upon Huizhuou women.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分力圖發掘女祠堂在徽州婦女觀念中的意義。

sentences.english: Or will punish us to bend ancestral temple?
sentences.chinese: 還是會罰咱們跪祠堂呢？

sentences.english: The third part explore the relationship between ancestress temple and the clan manners.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分探討女祠堂與宗族禮法之間的關係。
